thread.title: Asahi Kasei subsidiary worker linked to leaning Yokohama condo handled 41 projects over 10 years firm reveals
thread.title_full: Asahi Kasei subsidiary worker linked to leaning Yokohama condo handled 41 projects over 10 years firm reveals

title: Asahi Kasei subsidiary worker linked to leaning Yokohama condo handled 41 projects over 10 years firm reveals
text:
Asahi Kasei subsidiary worker linked to leaning Yokohama condo handled 41 projects over 10 years, firm reveals 
Japan Times Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
An Asahi Kasei Construction Materials Corp. employee at the center of a data falsification scandal involving a tilting condo in Yokohama oversaw the firmâ€™s piling work at 41 projects in nine prefectures over the past decade, the firm revealed Thursday. 
The company, currently in hot water over defective piling work at the Park City Lala Yokohama condominium, released the breakdown and category of 3,040 buildings that it had worked on since 2005. 
The list shows the buildings included not only condos but also schools, hospitals and offices. The buildings are located in 45 of th...
